short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will determine a customers age before checkout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the customers DOB from their ID while checking out in the Vend web register. Allows customized age restriction 18 years old, 21 years old, or even 5 years old.
